directions.step: Start boiling a large pot of salted water.
While the water is heating up, put the basil in a food processor along with the garlic, grated Parmesan and pine nuts.
Turn on the food processor and add the oil while the blade is spinning.
Add the oil until the consistency of the pesto is creamy (roughly that of hummus).
Add salt and pepper to taste in the food processor.
When the water boils, add the linguine.
When the pasta is 'al dente' drain it (but keep a little of the pasta water, to add to the pesto in case it is too thick).
Put the pesto in a large mixing bowl, put in the pasta and mix thoroughly.
